text: Løten Church (Løten kirke) is a medieval era church located at Løten in Innlandet county, Norway. It is built of brick and dates to ca. 1200. It has Romanesque stylistic features, and has 400 seats. The church has been extended and modified several times. The pulpit and altarpiece are from the renovation in 1873. The church was externally restored in 1989–1990 with an interior refurbish in 1995. ==References== ==Further reading== * ==External links== * Category:Churches in Innlandet
title: Løten Church
